doc.title: Server Timing

value.content: The Server Timing specification enables the server to communicate performance metrics from the request-response cycle to the user agent, and utilizes a JavaScript interface to allow applications to collect, process, and act on these metrics to optimize application delivery.

value.title: See also
value.content:
• https://www.w3.org/TR/server-timing/
  • Resource Timing
